body.p: 1. Reubenite, Zaccur’s son and one of the 12 spies sent by Moses to search out the land of Canaan (Nm 13:4).
2. Alternate name for Shimea, David’s son, in 2 Samuel 5:14 and 1 Chronicles 14:4. See Shimea #2.
3. Alternate name for Shemaiah, Galal’s son, in Nehemiah 11:17. See Shemaiah #6.
4. Head of a family who returned to Jerusalem with Zerubbabel after the Babylonian exile (Neh 12:18).
